Title: Lilies
Writer: Michel Marc Bouchard (based upon the play by: "Les Feluettes,  ou La Répétition d'un drame romantique"), Michel Marc Bouchard (screenplay by), Linda Gaboriau (screenplay by: English Version)
Actors: Ian D. Clark, Marcel Sabourin, Aubert Pallascio, Jason Cadieux
Plot: 1952: Bishop Bilodeau visits a québécois prison to hear the confession of a boyhood friend jailed for murder 40 years ago. The inmates force the prelate to watch a play depicting what ...
